description:
This realm can be used with the sample programs for any of the language bindings.  Each executable (or class) corresponds to an application in this realm.  Note that realm application names are all lowercase which corresponds to the application strings used in the sample connect call.

By default all the application instances use a shared-memory transport.  To use other transports, supply an identifier string using the "--identifier" command line argument with a string of "<tport>".

The samples that use inboxes are not configured with an mcast instance since mcast does not support inboxes.
name: _default_realm
